official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the forgiveness of Perkins loans to members of the armed services on active duty.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for student loan forgiveness for members of the Armed Forces on active duty, under the Federal Perkins Loan program.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the forgiveness of Perkins loans to members of the armed services on active duty.
